claim_card.claim: Phase 1 is characterized as an add-on stage where RGPx regulates error correction via Φ-plateaus and phase alignment beneath analog/quantum systems.
claim_card.test_hook: Implement a minimal controller that detects plateau-like regions in a measurable scalar and compare stability/error metrics vs a baseline controller.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: RGPx functions beneath analog / quantum systems, regulating error correction via Φ-plateaus and phase alignment. Add-on stage.
